QueryResult.text: SELECT p.id portfolio_key, NVL(p.capital_cost_target,0) + NVL(p.operating_cost_target,0) target_total_cost, NVL(p.capital_cost_target,0) target_capital_cost, NVL(p.operating_cost_target,0) target_operating_cost, NVL(p.benefits_target,0) target_benefits, NVL(p.resources_target,0) target_roles, p.last_updated_date clarity_updated_date FROM pfm_portfolios p WHERE 1=1
